text: Day Zero is a 2022 Filipino action zombie movie directed by Joey De Guzman. It stars Brandon Vera, Mary Jean Lastimosa, Pepe Herrera, Jema Galanza, Shermaine Santiago, Ricci Rivero and Freya Fury Montierro. ==Other websites== * Category:2022 action movies Category:Filipino movies Category:Movies about outbreaks Category:Movies set in prisons
title: Day Zero (2022 movie)
